# OverAndOver - Crypto

The challenge provides a base64-encoded string that remains scrambled after decoding, hinting at multiple layers of base64 encoding.

> You found a strange string that seems to be encoded with base64... yet still scrambled after decoding...

## solve.py

```py
from base64 import b64decode

ciphertext = ""

while True:
    try:
        ciphertext = b64decode(ciphertext).decode()
    except:
        print(ciphertext)
        break
```
